```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(pheatmap)
library(colorspace)
```

```{r data_read, include=FALSE}
# read enrichment results
mwsagd <- read_tsv("../../results/elasticnet_LR_model_weights/sagd_enrichment.tsv") %>% 
  rename(zscore = combined_zscore) %>% 
  rename(term_id = term)

# line to make palette with colorspace gui
# choose_palette(pal = diverging_hcl, n = 7L, parent = NULL, gui = "tcltk")

brbg <- brewer.pal(11, "BrBG")
brbg_palette <- c(colorRampPalette(c(brbg[1], brbg[6]))(21),
    colorRampPalette(c(brbg[6], brbg[11]))(21)[-1])

# dark colors hex codes blue "#1c4587ff"/ orange "#783f04ff"
#blue/orange using on slides for M/F
fm_palette <- c("#6fa8dcff", "#e69138ff")

# order of age groups
fine_ag_order <- c("fetus", "infant", "young_child", "child", 
                                   "adolescent", "young_adult", "adult", 
                                   "middle_adult", "older_adult", "old_adult", "elderly")

age_ranges <- c("< 0", "[0-2]", "(2-8]", "(8-12]", "(12-20]", 
                "(20-35]", "(35-45]", "(45-60]", "(60-70]", "(70-80]", "> 80")

ar_tibble <- tibble(age_group = fine_ag_order, age_range = age_ranges, ag_number = c(1:11))

# add age range col to mwsagd
mwsagd <- left_join(mwsagd, ar_tibble, by = "age_group")

# cut extreme zscore values to reasonable range
mwsagd <- mwsagd %>% 
  mutate(zscore = ifelse(zscore > 5, 5, zscore)) %>% 
  mutate(zscore = ifelse(zscore < -5, -5, zscore))
```

```{r make_zscore_heatmap, include=FALSE}
make_zscore_heatmap <- function(df, s){
  
  # subset sex
  df <- df %>% 
    filter(sex == s)
  
  # set up matrix for heatmap
  row_names <- age_ranges
  col_names <- df %>% pull(term_id) %>% unique()
  
  mat <- matrix(rep(0, length(row_names) * length(col_names)), nrow = length(row_names))
  rownames(mat) <- row_names
  colnames(mat) <- col_names
  
  col_annotation <- data.frame(SAGD_sex = ifelse(grepl("female", col_names), "female", "male"))
  row.names(col_annotation) <- col_names
  
  for (ar in row_names){
    for (t in col_names){
      zs <- df %>% 
        filter(age_range == !!ar) %>% 
        filter(term_id == !!t) %>% 
        pull(zscore)
      if (length(zs) == 0){
        zs <- NA
      }
      mat[ar, t] <- zs
    }
  }
  
  heatmap <- pheatmap(mat, color = brbg_palette, 
                      cluster_rows = F, cluster_cols = T,
                      annotation_col = col_annotation,
                      annotation_colors = list(SAGD_sex = c(female = "#6fa8dcff", male = "#e69138ff")))
  return(heatmap)
}
```

```{r}
female_mwsagd_heatmap <- make_zscore_heatmap(mwsagd, 'female')
```

```{r}
ggsave("~/Desktop/female_model_weight_sagd_enrichment_heatmap.pdf", 
       width = 12, height = 6, plot = female_mwsagd_heatmap)
```
